name: Active Defense
desc: You defend yourself with a weapon, mitigating an incoming blow.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status.
effect: Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of your choice. You may choose to gain the _Parry_ effect of a _Wielded_, undamaged piece of _Equipment_.
special: If, after resolving all effects, the total Damage is greater than the _Durability_ of the _Equipment_ it gains _Damaged_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Gain the _Parry_ effect of a _Damaged_ Weapon.
* 1 _Momentum_: Gain the _Parry_ benefits of two _Wielded_ _Weapons_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Basic Feint
desc: You feint one way before attacking another, providing yourself an advantage.
effect: Before resolving the Attack, inflict _Exposed_ 1.

name: Basic Flourish
desc: You disengage from an attack artfully, creating an opening for an ally.
reqs: You complete a Single-Target _Melee_ Attack against a foe.
effect: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 2.

name: Basic Sunder
desc: You focus an attack on breaking a foe's armor or guard.
reqs: You make a Single-Target _Melee_ Attack against a foe.
effect:
Choose one before making your _Attack Roll_. Regardless of the option you choose, resolve the _Attack_ as [_Glancing_] against the original Target, but not for determining the following effects:
* If the Damage dealt with this _Attack_ is greater than or equal to the _Durability_ of the creature's _Armor_, inflict _Shred_ 1.
* Choose a piece of the creature's _Wielded_ _Equipment_. The Target may not use the _Parry_ effect of that Equipment against this _Attack_. If the Damage dealt with this _Attack_ is greater than or equal to half the _Durability_ of a piece of the creature's _Equipment_ inflict _Disarmed_ [1 _Defense_]/_Impaired_ 1. If the Damage dealt is greater than or equal its _Durability_, you may instead inflict _Disarmed_ [2 _Defense_]/_Impaired_ 2 or _Damage_ the _Equipment_.

name: Create Opening
desc: You launch a quick assault, diverting a foe's attention so an ally can strike.
trigger: A foe within your _Reach_ is Attacked.
effect: Before resolving the Attack, inflict _Exposed_ 1.

name: Disengage
desc: You focus your efforts on moving away from hostile foes.
effect: Add [_Safe_] to all _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Dodge
desc: You slip away from an incoming attack, avoiding the brunt of the blow.
effect: _Move_ up to your _Step_ distance and use the _Tumble_ _Manuever_ at no cost. If you cannot or do not _Move_, this _Maneuver_ instantly fails. If the Attack was Single-Target, add [_Glancing_]. If it was _Area_ and you are no longer in the _Area_, add [_Glancing_]. After resolving all other effects gain _Exposed_ 1.

name: Draw/Stow
desc: You grab an unattended item or change your equipment.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, or 0 _Momentum_ if the Equipment has the _Quickdraw_ property.
effect:
Choose one:
* Create an _Opening_. _Equip_/_Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) a single unattended, adjacent piece of _Equipment_.
* _Equip_ a _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_.
* _Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) an _Equipped_ piece of _Equipment_.
special: Before _Wielding_ an item, you may choose to stop _Wielding_ _Equipment_ of your choice, placing them unattended in your current or adjacent spaces.

name: Engage
desc: You obstruct a foe's movement, making it difficult for them to advance.
trigger: A creature of your Size or smaller moves adjacent to you with Movement without [_Rush_] or [_Leaping_].
effect: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_. If they do not, their Movement immediately ends and you may inflict _Marked_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature your Size+1 or smaller'.

name: Improvised Combo
desc: An impromptu strike, often used to set up an incoming blow.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your Jump Value, is [_Leaping_] Movement. This Movement must be taken in a straight line, and this Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on the opening created by a repositioning foe, moving to strike while you can.
trigger: An enemy within your _Reach_ creates an _Opening_.
effect: Make a Single-Target _Minor Attack_ against the triggering creature. You must use a _Minor Attack_ with a _Reach_ capable of attacking the Target.

name: Prepare
desc: You catch your breath, collecting yourself and preparing for battle.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.

name: Recover
desc: You use your grit, reflex, and poise to push through hindrances.
effect:
_Refresh_ your _Defenses_. Choose one:
* You may expend _Poise_ to remove _Afflictions_ you currently have, spending the same amount to remove them that you would spend to negate.
* You may attempt to escape a _Grab_ without paying the initial _Momentum_ cost.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead of one of the above options, remove _Broken_ or _Staggered_.

name: Reorient
desc: You swiftly move, adjusting your footing before taking a more serious action.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.

name: Raise Guard
desc: You adopt a defensive stance, warding yourself against harm.
effect: Create an _Arc_ with a _Range_ of _Self_ and choose a _Wielded_ piece of un-_Damaged_ _Equipment_. Gain the _Parry_ effect of this piece of _Equipment_ against all _Attacks_ that originates in or pass through one of those spaces. At the end of each of your _Turns_ you may move this _Arc_. This effect persists until the end of the _Round_, you make an _Attack_, or the relevant Equipment is _Disarmed_ or _Damaged_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may choose a piece of _Damaged_ _Equipment_.

name: Skirmish
desc: You unexpectedly make a minor attack.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll forward, moving swiftly and avoiding incoming strikes.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your _Step_ distance gain [_Safe_, _Blitz_, _Rush_]. This Movement must be taken in a straight line, and this Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Use Environment
desc: The environment is frequently its own weapon and opens many avenues of attack.
effect: Use the _Interact_ Action of an adjacent _Obstacle_.

name: Needle Spray
desc: A short-range spray of deadly needles.
effect: Instead attack in a _Cone_ 3.

name: Pinning Shot
desc: A powerful needle shot that can pin a foe in place.
effect: Add _Hobbled_ 1 on a _Graze_+.

name: Overwatch
desc: A prepared shot that is taken at the opportune moment.
effect: Choose a creature within _Range_ of one of your _Ranged_ Weapons. If that creature moves more than 1 space before the end of the _Round_ you may make a _Weapon Attack_ against them using this _Weapon_ with a +1 _Bonus_. Your _Ranged_ Weapon is _Occupied_ while this effect persists. You may end this effect for no cost at any time.

name: Lock Down
desc: A prepared shot that is taken at the opportune moment.
effect: Add _Impaired_ 1 and gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the next opposed _Grab_ roll this _Round_.

name: Spread Claws
desc: An insectoid spreads its mighty claws, controlling an area.
effect: For the remainder of the _Phase_ any Movement within your _Reach_ triggers _Opportunity Attack_. Treat your Attacks as 1 faster when used for _Opportunity Attack_.

name: Slip Away
desc: You carefully disengage after an attack.
effect: Add [_Safe_ 2] against the attacked creature.

name: Chemical Warfare
desc: A blast of toxic gasses.
effect: Create a _Cone_ 2 of _Toxic Gas_ within Range 6. This gas is removed at the end of the _Round_.

name: Smog
desc: A small cloud of toxic gasses.
effect: Create a space of _Toxic Gas_ in an adjacent space until the end of the _Round_.
